ValidationRule.description: Ticket 277324: The "Reference Opportunity" cannot be changed nor removed once Gate 4 has been approved or bypassed (i.e. once Sales Phase is in "Win the Case (Negotiate)" and above). (Req 636: Reference Oppty shouldn't be changed after "Create Offer")
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Win the Case (Negotiate)"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Handover (Prepare for Delivery)"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Execute (Start Delivery)"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Completed") ), ISCHANGED( Reference_Opportunity__c ), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "Reference Opportunity" cannot be changed nor removed once Gate 4 has been approved or bypassed (i.e. once Sales Phase is in "Win the Case (Negotiate)" and above).
